transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good morning sir India Mart se account
Customer: Awaz nahi aa rahi hai thodi
Executive: Sir Mayank baat kar raha hu India Mart se aapka account manager Shri Sunil at textiles mein baat ho rahi hai sir.
Customer: Haan boliye
Executive: Hello
Customer: Boliye aage boliye bhaiya aage boliye
Executive: Haan ye sir aapne na ek complaint raise kari hai aapki services live ho chuki hai kal India Mart ki
Customer: Bina puche hi live kiye abhi call to har ek cheez ke liye call aaya aur iske liye call aaya nahi live karne ke liye
Executive: No sir maine live karne ke liye hi to aaya hu maine call kiya aapko ki services aapki live ho chuki hai aur abhi aap services use kar sakte hai iski to mai usi cheez ke liye maine aapko guide kar raha hu
Customer: Kya puch raha hu bhaiya aapne suna nahi acche se
Executive: Mai ye bol raha hu ki aapko aapko call pehle karna chahiye tha na live karne ke liye
Customer: No sir wo to aapka jab aap jaisa aap payment karte ho se saat din mein aapki wo live ho jati hai services
Customer: Are wo sab to baat sahi hai wo sab baat sahi hai to live automatic ho jati hai sir
Executive: Haan ji
Customer: Kya bol rahe ho
Executive: Haan ji sir boliye aapki na awaz break ho gayi thi ji
Customer: Aap na pehle aapka awaz set up sahi kariye char bar to mai hi bol raha hu are ek hi cheez
Executive: Haan ji sir boliye boliye aap boliye
Customer: Mai mai bol raha hu ki live karne se pehle call karna tha
Executive: No sir to live to sorry sir service jab live ho jayegi tabhi to hum call kare kyuki jis din aap payment karte hai services us din se hum kyuki sir hume bhi to time chahiye hota hai na se saat din mein
Customer: Bhaiya wo sab baat ho gayi hamari se saat din chahiye sab management kar diya catalog wagera kiya sab ho gaya hamara sab catalog ke liye mujhe bahut sare calls aaye humne discussion kiya do teen edits bache the uske liye mai bata raha hu ki catalog ek bar mujhe last bata dete aur kuch doubts the hi usme
Executive: To koi nahi sir wo sir dekhiye account manager mai hu na wo jo bhi doubts hai aapke catalog mein product add ke liye ya kisi bhi cheez ke liye kuch issue hai to mujhe bata dijiye mai correct kar dunga aapka
Customer: Abhi tak to account manager koi aur the
Executive: No sir wo aapke jinhone aapko services provide karwai hongi wo honge aapke wo wo aapke sales manager honge mai account manager hu aapko service ke regarding catalog ke regarding kuch bhi issue aata hai to aap mujhe chase karenge abhi uske liye
Customer: Thik hai haan ji
Executive: Thik hai aap ek bar alternate number pe call kar sakte ho kya jo mere ko alternate number haan father ka number services aap handle nahi
Customer: Mai karta hu handle unko ek do doubts hai wo karwane hai mai humne impact impact jo hai to impact ki images change karne bolenge to wo change kiya nahi hai impact images aur sabki jo ye show values hai wo dikhna chahiye product ke baad mein
Executive: Product ke bare mein
Customer: Accha ek minute sir mai ek bar abhi check kar leta hu isme kyuki sir yaha pe aapke jo product add hai na aapke abhi wo wo wahi hai wahi wale jo pehle the aapke usme
Executive: Aur aapke aath product isme inactive bhi hai
Customer: Kya bol rahe ho
Executive: Sir aapke jo products ke regarding hai na
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan
Executive: Haan ji sir awaz aa rahi hai aapko meri haan haan boliye
Executive: Haan mai keh raha hu sir aapko jo bhi concern hota hai na pehle to aap abhi mai abhi secondary number pe kar le raha hu call aapke baki ye jo complaint aapne dali thi na maine complaint ke regarding hi call kiya tha ki aapki services already live
Customer: Ye complaint dali thi aapke end se ye matlab complaint matlab customer ki taraf se baat ki hogi na kyuki aapko koi issue aa raha tha to isi regarding maine call kiya tha aapko
Customer: Kya complaint hai mai abhi thoda out of station tha isliye mere father dekh rahe the
Executive: Accha ji ji ji haan haan to matlab haan jo matlab yahi do complaint hone wali hai ki ek yahi nahi hai bol ke
Customer: To maine to bata di complaint aur kya janna hai aapko
Executive: Okay okay okay mai ek bar aapko isse matlab product se related hi hai na aapko mai ek bar secondary number pe call karu na iske regarding sir kyuki mere ko video meet pe aapko kuch cheeze guide bhi karni hai
Customer: Video meet pe kya guide karna hai
Executive: Ki matlab services kaise use karni hai koi aapko sales manager ne kya kya cheeze batai hai aapko kuch galat cheeze guide to nahi kari hai wo sari cheeze mai confirmation karunga uske baad hi mai aapki services aage
Customer: Secondary number pe ek bar call haan mai secondary number pe ek bar call kar leta hu thik hai sir
Executive: Okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Services activated without prior call.

- Impact images not changed.

- Show values not visible after product.

- Eight products are inactive.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified role as account manager.

- Offered to correct catalog issues.

- Will call on secondary number for video meet.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on secondary number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- services, catalog, products, account manager, complaint
